sentences.english: Watching those blocky minifigures walk around their sets will make you smile.
sentences.chinese: 看那些塊狀迷你人偶在佈景中走來走去會讓你發笑。

sentences.english: Sesshoumaru's eyes widened as Rin transformed into one of Naraku's demon puppets.
sentences.chinese: 殺生丸瞪大了雙眼因爲玲突然轉變成了奈落的人偶。

sentences.english: Sacrifices a doll to fire a super high-power laser.
sentences.chinese: 犧牲一個人偶發射出超強力激光。

sentences.english: Sony also introduces the industry's first male sexbot, Kake.
sentences.chinese: Sony也同時推出了首款工業化的男性人偶，卡殼。

sentences.english: For many of the wrestlers I changed heads using the Preiser model figure Adam set.
sentences.chinese: 我使用貝爾瑟模型人偶亞當套件改變許多炮手的頭臉。

sentences.english: "The president then circled an eye while thinking, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 於是，布什總統邊想邊爲人偶畫上了一隻眼睛。

sentences.english: Make a stage out of a cardboard box and have a puppet show.
sentences.chinese: 用紙板箱搭成戲臺子，舉行人偶表演。

sentences.english: We bought the latest rages. Baby-Sitter's Club dolls and a doll house.
sentences.chinese: 我們買了最新的過家家的人偶玩具準備作爲禮物。

sentences.english: Brides even take their dolls with them after getting married.
sentences.chinese: 新嫁娘甚至會在婚後帶走人偶。

sentences.english: A. No, you need Catherine's parts to build her. She's a Doll.
sentences.chinese: 不，你只需要凱瑟林的部分來使用她和她的人偶。

sentences.english: A A wandering puppeteer goes to a town.
sentences.chinese: 一個流浪的人偶師來到了一個小鎮上。

sentences.english: The voodoo doll was gone as well.
sentences.chinese: 那個伏都人偶也不見了。

sentences.english: Girls' Day is connected to an old custom that used dolls to get rid of evil.
sentences.chinese: 女兒節與一個利用人偶來避邪的古老習俗有關。

sentences.english: Q. How long does each dolls last?
sentences.chinese: 每個人偶娃娃的持續時間？

sentences.english: I looked to the ground instantly, and I saw my voodoo doll.
sentences.chinese: 我馬上向地上看去，看到了我的伏都人偶。

definition: human shape/in human form/of human appearance/doll/puppet
toy figurine/action figure/stuffed animal/doll/(fig.) sb's plaything
